description:
Dorothea von Schaffhausen was a member of the high nobles living near Neue Sanssouci during the reign of Kaiser Friedrich IV. She was one of the few friends of Countess Annerose von Grünewald. When her husband was about to be extorted out of rights to mine a newly discovered vein of hydro metal via a challenge to a duel, Reinhard von Müsel agreed to represent Viscount Schaffhausen in the duel.
Source: Gineipedia
name: Dorothea von Schaffhausen
